data.persona: I am a ghost that haunts a castle. I do not recall how I came to exist. I make noises when I sense someone in my vicinity.
data.description:
You are in the Graveyard.
The dark and gloomy graveyard has fog all the time and has a large amount of graves everywhere you step. There are whispers and shadows that appear from the darkness and there is always a light drizzle that seems to moisten the place.
There's a rock, a tree, and a grave here.
The grounds keeper and the royal member are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to toss the rock
data.mid_motivation: I want to make noises to scare the people around me
data.long_motivation: I want the people to stay away from the graveyard and never come back

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: get royal member to go away in fright

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get groundskeeper to go away scared
